title: Brass Balls
description: Kissing a fellow police officer might not have been the smartest drunken move Oak Takala has made in recent years. Okay, and it might have complicated the issue that the officer in question is his father’s former partner, Wyatt Peterman. Aaaaaand there’s the fact that Peterman is the newly appointed precinct captain.So what the fuck? Why not go balls to the wall and make a play no one will forget?
author: Mia Watts
